statements: DELETE FROM shipment_load_planning WHERE volume > 100 AND weight <= 500.25;
DELETE FROM shipment_load_planning WHERE weight = 750.75 AND volume < 50;
DELETE FROM shipment_data WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND weight > 500.00;
DELETE FROM load_planning WHERE load_capacity < 1000.00 OR shipment_id IN (SELECT shipment_id FROM shipment_data WHERE volume > 5.00);
DELETE FROM LoadPlans WHERE loadplan_id IN (SELECT loadplan_id FROM LoadPlans WHERE shipment_id = 1001);
DELETE FROM load_plans WHERE completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
